TextBlock.Text: The resupply runs have stopped. What has become of the others? My food and water stores are limited. Is abandoning my mission and returning my only option?
I created a makeshift sensor apparatus and sent it through the wormhole. I detected no signs of life. I hypothesize that something terrible has happened.
I have decided. I will not return through the wormhole and abandon my work. I will maintain this craft for as long as I am able.

I can hardly raise my staff any longer... If my life has ended, please, honor an old Nomai's final request: make use of my clan's knowledge. Discover the true nature of the Eye. Attain the enlightenment we could not.
